item.title: Elham add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "In eternity there is no time, only an instant long enough for a joke." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Elham add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Elham add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "Man is sometimes extraordinarily, passionately, in love with suffering..." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Elham add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Elham add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does. It is up to you to give [life] a meaning." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Elham add a quote by سهراب سپهری / Sohrab Sepehri
item.description: "چرخ یک گاری در حسرت واماندن اسب اسب در حسرت خوابیدن گاریچی مرد گاریچی در حسرت مرگ" -- سهراب سپهری / Sohrab Sepehri

item.title: Elham add a quote by Marcel Proust
item.description: "Remembrance of things past is not necessarily the remembrance of things as they were." -- Marcel Proust

item.title: Elham add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "A moral system valid for all is basically immoral." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Elham add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "He's a wallflower. You see things. You keep quiet about them. And you understand." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Elham add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal." -- Albert Camus
